The following notes from Mr. Goodellâ€”said to use them in any shape or form
or not use at all.
Mr. Goodell and I will he meeting on Friday to check inventory of our accomplishments
under the contract. We have delayed sending a check for August pending this
review of the whole picture. You will certainly hear from me again in a week's
time or less.
I understand that Mr. Levy has been working with you for one month on a trial
basis. I would appreciate it if yof would indicate your feelings about his work.
